email.title: Weekly Digest

image.title: Motion to stop biscuit images? Seriously, coming up with unique biscuits is actually quite hard, finding a good picture is even harder. Why not some sweet treats?

email.text:
Another week, another digest!<sup><sup><sup>Yeah it's Wednesday..</sup></sup></sup>
Check out our DoCSoc Education volunteering initiative below to teach Python to life sciences students. It's a great way to get experience in teaching students! Also, IC Hack 18, Internship 101, and an Accenture competition!
Without further ado...
email.heading: Volunteers Needed for DoCSoc Education
email.text:
*As you may have heard, we're starting a new initiative called DoCSoc Education aiming to teach students from other courses to code.*
Our first venture will be [teaching Python to students from life sciences courses](https://www.facebook.com/events/333505960463269/), and we could definitely use some volunteers to help. You don't have to be amazing at Python - if you're interested in helping, let us know by either sending us an email (docsoc@imperial.ac.uk), or PMing us on [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/ICDocSoc/).
email.heading: IC Hack 18 Hype!
email.text:
**When:** 27th January 2018, 10.00-28th January 2018, 16.00
**Where:** Imperial College London, Kensington, London, SW7 2AZ
**Link:** [Facebook](https://docsoc.co.uk/ichack18) [Eventbrite](http://ichack18.eventbrite.co.uk) If you managed to get a ticket, look forward to participating in IC Hack 18, the largest student-run hackathon in the UK, this weekend. It's bound to be a blast! **Please release your ticket on [Eventbrite](http://ichack18.eventbrite.co.uk) if you can no longer make it, as many others on the waiting list would love to get an opportunity to attend.** If you didn't manage to get a ticket or just interested to see what's happening, we'll be streaming parts of the event on our YouTube channel. [See here](https://docsoc.co.uk/live).
email.heading: Call for Internship 101 Speakers
email.text:
Have you worked for a company in the past who are currently still accepting applications? Share your experience with your fellow coursemates at Internship 101!
We're looking for speakers to speak at our Internship 101 event, happening soon! Like in past years, it's a panel-style event where you share your experience in a very short 5-10 minute talk. You don't need to have great public speaking skills, but be ready to answer questions about the company.
If this is something that you would like to do, please email us at docsoc@imperial.ac.uk.
email.heading: Oculus Rift Loan System
email.text:
We're putting in place a new loan system to allow you to take out an Oculus Rift for use in your projects. This will commence *after IC Hack* as we'll need the hardware.
Fill in the form at https://docsoc.co.uk/oculus to make a booking!
email.heading: Accenture Powerful Minds Competition
email.sponsor:
Discovering an insight into the way your mind works can be interesting. Food to boost your brain can also be tasty. And a little competition can be fun? We've combined all of these together to bring you a brand new initiative beginning in January.
## What's in it for you? - Chance to win cash prizes towards your society/club. First prize a massive £1,000! Second £250 and third £100. - Each society/club that signs up will also receive an assortment of delicious breakfast bars for your members to enjoy! *(editor's note: we'll figure out how to distribute these later)* - Individual weekly spot prizes: Accenture branded hoodies to keep you warm and Clifton StrengthsFinder assessment codes to help you discover more about yourself with an in-depth report of your strengths.
If you would like to participate, use [this link](https://ad.doubleclick.net/ddm/clk/411273196;211960615;a).
email.sign:
That's all for now!
Until next time,
